0.1.name: wordpress/insert-wandering-qr
0.1.description:
By using this plugin, you will be able to create a station in "Wandering" system, without leaving your blog. This means that you will use a wizard on your blog, instead of "Wandering" standard wizard.

The station created in your blog will be stored in "Wandering" database, and will be accessible as any other station is - using your email as the developer's email, your name as the developer's name, the post's title as the station's name, and the information you enter in the wizard.

When you complete the wizard, the station will be created in "Wandering" system, and you will have a link and a QR code added to the end of your post, enabling your readers to view the station on "Wandering" system.
